channel.title: ElasticSearch Notes on Jacob Henson
channel.description: Recent content in ElasticSearch Notes on Jacob Henson

item.title: Ingest Pipeline
item.description: Script Processor: Lowercase ArrayList of MapHashes Lowercase keys of MapHash in a ArrayList if(ctx.field_name != null){ ArrayList lower_array = new ArrayList(); for (item in ctx.field_name){ ArrayList temp = new ArrayList(); for(map_entry in item.entrySet()){ temp.add([map_entry.getKey().toLowerCase():map_entry.getValue()]) } lower_array.add(temp); } ctx.field_name = lower_array; }
